attributes.action: Suspend the rule that restricts Men who have sex with Men from donating blood
attributes.additional_details: I was contacted today to donate blood. However, I was blocked from donating due to being in a relationship with a man. It is dangerous that gay men are being blocked from giving or donating blood but this concern has become increased, due to the fact we are currently in a global pandemic. It is wrong, and scientifically limited to have these dangerous rules in place. That harms not only the gay community but also, the wider British public.
attributes.background: The government should suspend the rule that blocks gay man from donating blood. We are currently in a pandemic with research that needs to occur, to help create vaccinations or treatments. The government should suspend these rules throughout the pandemic, and inquire about extending the suspension.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560809
